transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: James, you better listen carefully. You owe us $3,900 and if you don't pay TODAY, I'm calling your employer tomorrow morning.

transcript.speaker: client
transcript.text: Wait, you can't do that! That would jeopardize my job.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Oh I absolutely can and will. In fact, I'm also going to contact all your neighbors and let them know what kind of deadbeat you are.

transcript.speaker: client
transcript.text: This is harassment! I need to verify this debt first.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Harassment? You're the one stealing our money! Pay now or you'll regret it. I've got connections, James. Don't test me.

transcript.speaker: client
transcript.text: I'm going to report this call.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Go ahead and try. Nobody's going to believe a thief like you. Pay up NOW!
